mapper.select: SELECT dept_code FROM emp_info WHERE emp_id=#{emp_id}
SELECT EMP_ID, SCHEDULE_NAME,START_DATE,END_DATE FROM EMP_SCHEDULE WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id} AND (START_DATE <= #{fDate} and END_DATE >= #{sDate})

SELECT emp_schedule.schedule_name,dept_info.dept_name, START_DATE, END_DATE FROM EMP_SCHEDULE join dept_info on(EMP_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_DEPT=dept_info.dept_code) WHERE emp_schedule.schedule_dept = #{schedule_dept} AND START_DATE <= #{fDate} and END_DATE >= #{sDate}

SELECT CONSULT_SCHEDULE.CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_INFO.CUSTOMER_NAME, CONSULT_SCHEDULE.CONSULT_CONTENT FROM CONSULT_SCHEDULE JOIN CUSTOMER_INFO ON(CONSULT_SCHEDULE.CUSTOMER_ID = CUSTOMER_INFO.CUSTOMER_ID) WHERE CONSULT_CODE = 'RG' AND CONSULT_DATE = #{date}

SELECT consult_info.consult_name, CUSTOMER_INFO.CUSTOMER_NAME, CONSULT_SCHEDULE.CUSTOMER_ID, CONSULT_SCHEDULE.CONSULT_CONTENT FROM CONSULT_SCHEDULE JOIN CUSTOMER_INFO ON(CONSULT_SCHEDULE.CUSTOMER_ID = CUSTOMER_INFO.CUSTOMER_ID) join consult_info on (consult_info.consult_code = consult_schedule.consult_code) WHERE CONSULT_SCHEDULE.CONSULT_CODE LIKE 'MK%' AND CONSULT_DATE = #{date} order by consult_info.consult_name
